name: Annie (Ant)
description: AfterBartaccidentally destroyed Lisa's ant farm Annie was the only surviving ant. Annie became weaker and could only carry thirty times her own weight when Bart and Lisa decided to let her out into the wild after Lisa suspected that she had only two or three days to go in life. Right after Bart and Lisa released to the nature, she was eaten bySanta's Little Helper.

He and Lisa tried to do surgery on the hamster, but it was too late and he passed away, making Lisa very sad.

description: Terrenceis azombieappearing inDays of Future Future. During his explanation, Milhouse is bitten by Terrence, turning him into a zombie.

name: Trucker 3
description: After Homer decided to driveRed Barclay's truck toAtlanta, he andBarthad to drive 2200 miles in 10 hours. Homer took a bottle of pep pills to be up drive all night. description: Joeyis a sick young boy who works atBarney's Bowlarama.Homeris forced to stop working at the Bowlarama and starts to say good-bye to everyone. One of the people he says goodbye to is Joey, who is dressed like a shoe-shine boy. Homer says "don't worry, Joey, we'll make it to California some day" and Joey responds with "sure we will, Mr. Homer, sure we will" and coughs.

name: Mr. Bergstrom
description: Mr. Bergstrom took over forMs. Hooverafter she believed she had Lyme Disease andLisaimmediately took to him because he was the kind of male role model she needed in her life, but he had to leaveSpringfieldafter Ms. Hoover returned. A distraught Lisa ran to stop him, and Mr. Bergstrom gave her a note saying "You areLisa Simpson" before moving to Capitol City, where he said he got a job near the government housing projects. His final words to Lisa were "It will be okay Lisa, just read the note!".
